alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marshall and eastern Walsh Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 656 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Veseleyville, or 7 miles southwest of Grafton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Minto, Warsaw, Oakwood, Veseleyville, Voss and Mandt. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 164 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
